ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(TEXT(Deal_Type__c)= 'Eyeota Social' , AND( Forward_Opportunity_to_Data_Desk__c=TRUE, (OR(ISNULL(End_Date__c)=TRUE, OR(ISNULL(Start_Date__c)=TRUE, OR(ISNULL(Audience_Request_Notes__c)=TRUE, ISNULL(Platforms_Used__c)=TRUE)))) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill in the required fields below: Start Date End Date Audience Request Notes Platforms Used
